thread.title: Houston-area safari planner named No. 1 in the world
thread.title_full: Houston-area safari planner named No. 1 in the world

author: Cara Smith
title: Houston-area safari planner named No. 1 in the world
text:
See All Homes of the Day David Marek , owner of Ker & Downey told the HBJ in 2013 that his staff had beefed up by 30 percent over the past two years to keep up with increasing demand. Ker & Downey operates in over 80 countries globally, but the company’s major focus is on countries in Africa, according to a company release. Another Houston entity was recognized on the list. Though it didn’t nab a Top 100 spot on the magazine’s World’s Best Hotel’s list, the St. Regis Houston was recognized as earning an 88 out of 100 and being one of Texas’ best hotels. The magazine’s World’s Best Awards list was announce on NBC’s "Today" show and will appear in the August issue of the magazine.
